sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Amaryllis to Tityrus being the first heroick harangue of the excellent pen of Monsieur Scvdery, a witty and pleasant novel / Englished by a person of honour. Scudéry, Madeleine de, 1607-1701. Person of honour.
[2], 86, [8] p.
Printed for Will. Cademan ..., London : 1681.
Amaryllis to Tityrus is part of Les femmes illustres, variously attributed to Madeleine de Scudéry and to her brother Georges. Cf. information in notes in Bib. nat. and NUC pre-1956. Advertisement: p. [2]-[8] at end. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======

[2], 86, [8] p.
Printed for Will. Cademan ..., London : 1681.
Amaryllis to Tityrus is part of Les femmes illustres, variously attributed to Madeleine de Scudéry and to her brother Georges. Cf. information in notes in Bib. nat. and NUC pre-1956. Advertisement: p. [2]-[8] at end. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Will. Cademan
